pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Mobile DAST CI/CD Core

**This is a [mdast_cli](https://github.com/Dynamic-Mobile-Security/mdast-cli) core package. Include mDast backend API based on login/password method or by CI/CD token.**[![PyPi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/mdast_cli?color=3)](https://pypi.org/project/mdast-cli-core/)![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-raw/Dynamic-Mobile-Security/mdast-cli-core)![GitHub pull requests](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr-raw/Dynamic-Mobile-Security/mdast-cli-core)
